entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is being hidden in the wardrobe by Harry. He is mentioned as having yelps and being shut into the wardrobe.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is hiding Dobby in the wardrobe and trying to avoid Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle who is angry at Harry for ruining his joke. He is mentioned as having a Japanese-golfer joke and being close to Harry's face.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Uncle Vernon's son who has left his television on again according to Uncle Vernon. He is not directly involved in the conversation but mentioned as a reason for Uncle Vernon's anger.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school that Harry mentions as being his only place with friends. It is implied to be a better environment than the Dursleys' home.

relationships.description: Harry hides Dobby in the wardrobe to avoid Uncle Vernon. This is mentioned as 'Quick! In the wardrobe!'
Harry mentions that Hogwarts is the only place he has friends, implying a positive relationship with his friends at school.
